text: Samuel Kelly (born Roger Michael Kelly) (19 December 1943 â€“ 14 June 2014) was an English actor. He appeared in movies, television, radio and theatre. He was best known for his roles as Captain Hans Geering in 'Allo 'Allo and as Ted Liversidge in Barbara. Kelly had Cancer of unknown primary origin. He was admitted to a hospice on 13 June 2014. He died early the next morning, aged 70. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1943 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from cancer of unknown primary origin Category:Actors from Manchester Category:Cancer deaths in England Category:English movie actors Category:English radio actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors
title: Sam Kelly
